(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Declaration 
      (FunctionDeclaration 
        (StatementBlock 
          (Statement 
            (ExpressionStatement 
              (Expression 
                (Identifier "arg2"))))) 
        (Identifier "myFunction") 
        (FormalParameters 
          (RequiredParameter 
            (Identifier "arg1")) 
          (RequiredParameter 
            (Identifier "arg2")))))) 
  (Statement 
    (EmptyStatement ";")))
